# SecurityHelper.EncryptSha1 method

Function that given a string returns another string with the encrypted value of the input string. Uses the SHA1 algorithm.

```csharp
public static string EncryptSha1(string input)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| input | Value to encrypt. |

## Return Value

Returns a new String with the encrypted value in SHA1.
